    // implement resource here
	
	var req = request.body.data;
	
	var ga = new GlideRecord("u_inbound_logs");
	ga.initialize();
	ga.setValue('u_payload',JSON.stringify(req));
	ga.insert();
	
	var responseRec = new CreateRecord_SI().recCreate(req);
	gs.log("Response " + responseRec);
    return responseRec;

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.buildBody</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>buildBody</name><script><![CDATA[var buildBody = Class.create();
buildBody.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	buildJSON : function(request){
		
		var recObj = new GlideRecord('u_payslip_status');
		recObj.initialize();
		recObj.u_salary = request.u_income;
		recObj.u_income = request.u_incomeid;
		recObj.u_month = request.u_month;
		recObj.u_acceptance_by_user = request.u_payslip_acceptance;
		var number = recObj.insert();
		
	    if(JSUtil.notNil(number))
			
			return "Success";
		else
			return "Failure to create the record";
		
	},
	
    type: 'buildBody'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-26 11:16:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>860e031597518110caab797e6253af18</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>buildBody</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_860e031597518110caab797e6253af18</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 14:41:59</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_63ccaad297110110caab797e6253af96
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.Payslip_SI</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Payslip_SI</name><script><![CDATA[var Payslip_SI = Class.create();
Payslip_SI.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	sendTransaction : function(current){
	 
		var reqBody = {};
		
		var fields = current.getFields();
		for(var i=0;i<fields.size;i++) {
			
			var field = fields.get(i);
			var key = field.getName();
			if(field.hasValue()){
				reqBody[key] = field.getValue();
			}
		}
		
		
		
		var restCall = new RESTMessageV2('Other Instance Connection','Update Value');
	    restCall.setEndPoint('https://dev31650.service-now.com/api/272755/update_record');
		restCall.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(reqBody));
		restCall.executeAsync();
		
	},	
    type: 'Payslip_SI'
